Indication: treatment of patients with advanced non-small cell lung cancer (NSCLC) with KRAS G12C mutation and disease progression, monotherapy context

PICOs.Population: Adults with advanced non-small cell lung cancer (NSCLC) with mutated KRAS G12C who have progressed after at least one prior systemic line of therapy
PICOs.Outcomes: overall survival, progression-free survival, objective response rate, duration of response, safety, quality of life
